conversation.content: I'm calling about a refund that was promised five days ago. It still hasn't been processed to my account.
I apologize for that delay. Let me pull up your account immediately. May I have your account number or the phone number associated with your account?
The account number is 47892. The representative specifically told me it would be processed within 48 hours.

Thank you. I have your account here, number 478920-B, and I can see the previous interaction logged on October 23rd at 2:47 PM. The agent documented a refund approval for $89.50 but I don't see the processing confirmation.
That's correct. Can you explain why this wasn't completed as promised?

I see exactly what happened. The refund was approved but wasn't submitted to our billing department for final processing. This absolutely should not have occurred and I sincerely apologize for this oversight.
I appreciate the explanation. What are you going to do to resolve this today?

Certainly. I'm processing the refund immediately while we're on the phone. I'm submitting it with priority code PX-4521 which ensures it will be completed within 24 hours rather than the standard 3-5 business days.
Will I receive confirmation that this has actually been processed this time?

Absolutely. You'll receive an email confirmation to the address we have on file, which shows as j.morrison@techcorp.com, within the next 30 minutes. This will include your refund tracking number RFD-89234-QM.
Good. I also want to ensure this doesn't happen to other customers. This has been quite inconvenient.

I completely understand your frustration and you're right to bring this to our attention. I'm escalating this incident to our quality assurance team under case number QA-7756-19 to review the original interaction and prevent similar issues.
Thank you. Can you also apply some form of compensation for the inconvenience and my time?

Of course. For the inconvenience you've experienced, I'm authorized to apply a $25 service credit to your account in addition to your original refund of $89.50. This brings your total credit to $114.50.
That's acceptable. When exactly will these credits appear in my account?

The full amount of $114.50 will be credited to your account by 5:00 PM Pacific Time tomorrow, October 29th. If for any reason it doesn't appear, please call our priority line at 888-924-7823 and reference case PX-4521.
I'll be checking. Please make sure this is properly documented in my account this time.

Absolutely. I've documented everything thoroughly in your account, including the refund confirmation number RFD-89234-QM, the quality assurance case QA-7756-19, and my direct extension 4412 if you need to follow up with me personally.
Perfect. I expect this to be the last time I need to call about this issue.

I understand completely, and you have my assurance this is resolved. You'll receive your email confirmation shortly, and I've set a personal follow-up reminder to verify the credit posts successfully tomorrow. Thank you for your patience with us today.

scenario: complaining that resolution promised on previous call wasn't implemented
